test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of an authentication controller, covering scenarios such as successful login, invalid credentials, exception handling, and various invalid or missing input cases.

The tests validate various scenarios of the login functionality in the account lock controller, including successful login, invalid or missing data, login failure, empty request body, and invalid JSON.
The tests verify the login functionality of the account lockout controller, including scenarios for successful login, account lockout, invalid data, wrong credentials, and no data given.
